archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: European Union Telematics Controlled Terms (EUTCT) (H+V)
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: The European Union Telematics Controlled Terms (EUTCT) System is aCommunity repository and provider of lists of Substances in multiple languages for the ongoing exchange of data between information systems and applications throughout the European Medicines Regulatory Network (EMRN). EUTCT has been replaced by Referentials Management Services (RMS) as the central repository and provider of controlled terms. Nevertheless, stakeholders should continue to use EUTCT to browse lists of substances until the new Substances Management Services (SMS) become available.
